Name: Glacio Resistance Spray
AttributesDescription: Increases Glacio DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
BgDescription: A pressurized canister spray filled using an advanced process that creates a special protective layer on the user's body surface to increase resistance to specified types of injuries.
ObtainedShowDescription: Increases Glacio DMG RES of all Resonators in the team by 15%, lasting for 180s. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
